TEXT.S: Damone Brown sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas te 1979, byacing te 6 ru 28 ryax qu hintgan nya, kinhulan nya ga New York, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 206 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 96 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA.kawas 2001 mnwayaw ppzuy mari ga, mzyup squ te qutux lahuy ru te magal squliq, galun nqu Philadelphia 76ers. 2007 kawas sangka' NBA Sioux Falls. 2009 kawas 2 byacing 26 ryax, Damone Brown wal kyapun la. 2010 kawas,Damone Brown PBL,Buffalo Stampede mzyu mari. 2015 kawas galan nha Villa Maria College maki Buffalo, New York kunlang. kyapun yageh na nbu COVID 19 ini sangka' pspung la.
